name: Salted Eggplant Chips with Bruschetta Spread
author: Diamond Crystal Salt
summary: Thinly sliced and seasoned eggplant that delivered a light crunch before a meal.
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons Diamond Crystal® Kosher Salt
2 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, drained and chopped
Diamond Crystal® Kosher Salt, to taste
directions: Preheat an oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Place sliced eggplant between paper towels and lightly press out the excess moisture
Arrange eggplant slices on prepared baking sheet
Sprinkle slices with Diamond Crystal® Kosher Salt and oregano, and drizzle with olive oil
Bake until slices are browned and crisp, 13 to 15 minutes
Mix cream cheese, sundried tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, chopped roma tomato, and basil together in a bowl
Season with Diamond Crystal® Kosher Salt and ground black pepper
Add more olive for a thinner spread, if necessary
Top the eggplant slices with some of the spread
Serve immediately to maintain the eggplant crispiness
